type: This part of the forest is ancient. Its canopy was contested by linden, willow, and sequoia, which allowed adequate light to pass down for a motley of bushes to claim the thick layer of leaves below.

This part of the forest is rather young. Its canopy was claimed by hemlock and fir. Plenty of light passed through their crowns for a flood of herbs to take advantage of the crunchy layer of leaves below.
It feels like a primal forest. Its canopy was eclipsed by hemlock, hazel, and cedar.
This is a dark side of the forest.
surrounding: Curling creepers hung from a couple of trees, and a jumble of flowers, which grew in a sprinkled and disorderly fashion, enriched the emerald forest floor.
Quiet branches waved from every tree, and a potpourri of flowers, which blossomed brightly, added more life to the otherwise uniform view.
Thin climbing plants held onto many trees, and a range of flowers, which blossomed brightly, brightened up the otherwise monotone landscape.
Bundled branches held onto many trees, and various flowers, which claimed remnants of light, clashed with the otherwise uniform view.
sounds: A disharmony of wild noises caused by bird songs added life to the forest, and the sounds of the occasional splashes of frogs jumping in the nearby lake.
A mishmash of beastly noises, mainly belonging to insects and critters, reverberated through the air and drowned out the occasional sounds of large animals in the distance.
A cacophony of wild sounds, mainly belonging to small creatures, reverberated through the air and overpowered the occasional sounds of breaking twigs beneath the feet of larger animals.
A cacophony of beastly sounds and the occasional roar of a large animal trying to scare away predators.

type: Witcher was walking through the endless field of flovers.
It is an abandoned field. Looks like the farmer left it a couple years ago.
Witcher stepped into the endless cornfield.
It is a grass field. Not a very safe place for a human.
surrounding: Falcons are flying high and looking for a prey.
Strange sounds are coming from the south side of the field. It's definitely not human or animal. Monsters?
He hears that the hyenas are somewhere nearby.
A strong wind shakes the field.
sounds: 'It feels nice here, but I don't think that the journey will be so pleasant,' said Witcher.
It is windy and cold here. Beautiful but cold.
Witcher mentioned footprints. A group of hyenas is somewhere around.
'Howl of hyenas, where they are?'

type: The rocky road means Witcher is close to mountains.
Witcher is hiking between rocks and ice cubes.
It is a Verden Mountains region. True north, full of snow, white wolves, and ice trolls.
Witcher steps into a world of rocks, mountains, and snow.
surrounding: These peaks in the Verden Mountains are some of the most beautiful you will ever see.
The mountains are beautiful. There is something about them that makes them magical. No matter where you take a look, you will see ice peaks.
There's nothing quite like a mountain. These beautiful, dangerous, unique geological features are often overlooked and under-appreciated.
It is a dangerous place for a traveler but not for a Witcher.
sounds: It is windy and cold here. Beautiful but cold.
'An Ice Troll is somewhere nearby,' said Witcher out loud and pulled his sword out of a scabbard.
Witcher mentioned footprints. An old White Wolf is somewhere around.
'Hmm, Medallion's humming. It means that a monster is here,' said Witcher.

type: Witcher walked out to the river. It is a wild and beautiful place, home to a variety of birds, fish, and animals.
A wide stormy river was in front of Witcher.
It is the Toina river. It is moving from the mountains in the north toward the sea in the south.
A beautiful river flowing through a forest.
surrounding: Floating upright in the water, the deadwood has a breathtaking appearance and a mysterious, otherworldly feel. It is both beautiful and dangerous.
The water flowing down the mountain is very beautiful.
What is that sound? This is a waterfall cascading down a steep rock face into a deep river.
The river at the bottom of the waterfall was too fast-flowing for a swim.
sounds: 'Kurva,' Witcher swore. 'I hate being wet,' said Witcher
'A Drowner is somewhere nearby,' said Witcher out loud and pulled his sword out of a scabbard.
'Brr, I hate crossing rivers. But I have to continue my mission,' said Witcher
Witcher mentioned footprints. A couple of male White Wolves were here less than an hour ago.

type: A swamp squelches under the feet of Witcher. He is in a swampland.
It is a swampland. The land of water, dirt, birch trees, and Kikimoras.
Witcher blew the dirt up to his waist, crossing the swampland.
Swamp general description 4.
surrounding: A rabbit ran past Witcher.
Ravens sit on lopsided birch trees and look in on a stranger.
There are signs of the presence of kikimoras everywhere.
The remains of a kikimora were barely visible in the dirt.
sounds: 'Howl of Kikimora, where it is?'
'Kurva,' Witcher swore. 'I hate swamplands.'
'Hm, an abandoned kikimora nest. It is empty, but I can feel the presence of monsters here,' said Witcher out loud.
'Kikimora Warrior is somewhere nearby,' said Witcher out loud.

type: The crisp and clean-looking town looked more like a jungle as trees and gardens grew beyond their unkempt boundaries.
Not a long time ago, it was a field full of crops. But now it is devastated.
The Death had spread across this part of Verden, and the fields were empty of life.
This is burned land.
surrounding: The sounds of insects, winds, and creaking wood of trees which were once drowned out by the sounds of horses and people, had returned as the dominant sounds.
A destroyed village, ravaged by a fire, left with only memories of horror and destruction.
Corpses, ashes, and the smell of a battlefield are all around.
The remains of a destroyed farmer's house emerge into the light of a spring day, overgrown with grass and trees as if nature itself has reclaimed the land.
sounds: Streets and streets of abandoned homes made for a terrifying thought. Each house was once a home belonging to a family, and now there was only emptiness.
'Hmm, Medallion's humming. It means that a monster is here,' said Witcher.
'A Katakan is somewhere nearby,' said Witcher out loud and pulled his sword out of a scabbard
'Scorched earth is a Heaven for Ghouls. These corpse-eaters could be everything. I should be careful,' said Witcher out loud
